MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the KY7, KY14 and KY15 areas of Cupar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:05am. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our engineers have arrived onsite in the local area to investigate the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:21am on Monday, 29 March 2021
